name: Cat vs Mouse: Fun Casual game
name_original: Cat vs Mouse: Fun Casual game
description:
Play Cat and mouse to get destressed. It's a fun and engaging game where you control the mouse using touch and save it from the cat. You collect cheese to get points.

The pace of both mouse and cat increases with score and game become more interesting. 

There are many powerups to help the mouse escape from the cat. 

1. Hourglass- Slow's down the speed of the game for some time and reduces the cat speed.

2. Health kit- Restores the mouse's health.

3. Mouse door- Mouse can teleport to the opposite side of the screen using this. The cat gets confused and searches for the mouse for some time.

How fast can you move your finger? This game will test your hand eye coordination.

It can be played completely offline but you need Google Play games to post your score on the leaderboard.

Have fun playing cat and mouse.
